General.Name: Central Reinsurance Corp
General.Description: Central Reinsurance Corporation provides a range of property and life inward and outward reinsurance services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers non-life insurance products, such as fire, aviation, casualty, motor, marine hull and cargo, engineering, and residential earthquake insurance products. It also provides life, personal accident, and health insurance products; and risk management solutions. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
